caption: Two men enter a building, they take an elevator to higher floors and say something to the receptionist, and then they are invited to an office. A man who looks like a manager greet them, and they start a conversation. After a while, they go to a room, in which is a destroyed portrait. The manager gives something to the men and ask them to do something. Then they begin to search for something in the offices.  They search very carefully. And after a while,, they leave the office while talking something and finally leave the building. They go to another place and say something to the owner of a house.
